property.caption: Attribute
property.description: The attribute to display.

property.caption: Inputbox class
property.description: The class that will be placed on the inputbox.

property.caption: Display input field.
property.description: Boolean to turn the input field on/off.

property.caption: Display type
property.description: The type of display setting.

property.caption: Width
property.description: The width of the circle diagram in pixels.

property.caption: Height
property.description: The height of the circle diagram in pixels.

property.caption: Bar color
property.description: The color for the bar.

property.caption: Foreground color
property.description: The color for the text.

property.caption: Background color
property.description: The color for the background of the bar.

property.caption: Color label
property.description: The color for the text of the label at the bottom.

property.caption: Color amount/maximum
property.description: The color for the text "amount/maximum" of the label at the bottom.

property.caption: Label
property.description: The label that is shown in center underneath the diagram.

property.caption: Line thickness
property.description: Thickness of the line compared to the circle's surface. 1 would fill the entire circle, 0.1 would be 10% of the circle's radius.

property.caption: Line cap
property.description: The shape of the line's ending cap.

property.caption: Minimum value
property.description: The minimum value the diagram can start at.

property.caption: Maximum value
property.description: The maximum value the diagram can go to.

property.caption: Maximum value (attribute)
property.description: The maximum value the diagram can go to as specified by an attribute.

property.caption: Show as percentage
property.description: The value can be shown as a percentage.

property.caption: Step size
property.description: The increment that the steps use.

property.caption: Angle offset
property.description: The offset at which the circle should start.

property.caption: Angle arc
property.description: The amount of degrees of a circle that should be shown.
